resources.string: "If you enjoy using %s, please take a moment to rate it. It won't take more than a minute. Thanks for your support!"
Are you sure you want to clear all the statistics on the program \"%s\"?
Reset will affect your progress, statistics, and reminders. Are you sure you want to reset all the data on the program \"%s\"?

"As a general rule of thumb, if you're working out on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, a good time to take the test is on Saturday afternoon. This allows enough recovery time from the Friday workout, but also gives you plenty of rest before starting the next stage of the plan on Monday."
Remember to perform exhaustion test within 24–48 hours of completing week.
You will be able to train for the \"%s\" program. In this case, the remaining exercises will still not available prior to purchase.
Get 40% discount if you buy all the programs. You will have access to all the programs.

"This trial version of the \"%s\" program has a trial period of 2 weeks.
All programs have a similar principle of work and are designed for 6 weeks."
Week and Day have been reset
Repeating day for the next workout
Repeating week for the next workout
You manage more than %d reps. We recommend that you start on Week 3. Is that OK?
(your previous result is shown on the right)
Program has already been purchased and will be available later with one of the updates
Click again to restart the day
"The Market billing service is not available at this time. You can continue to use this app but you won't be able to make purchases."
If for some reason you struggled with the program, we would suggest you repeat this day or week.
This trial version of the \"%s\" program has a trial period of 2 weeks. The full version of the program is designed for 6 weeks. To continue the training you need to purchase the full version.

"This trial version of the \"%s\" program has a trial period of 2 weeks. The full version of the program is designed for 6 weeks.
To continue the training you need to buy the full version. If you want to start from the beginning of the program, click \"Restart\"."
Congratulations! You have reached the end of the 6 weeks. We recommend either starting on Week4, or the beginning.
Change the number of reps that you have done in this set (in the last set you need to do so much reps as you can, but not less than %d)
Add 30 seconds of rest between each set if you need to
Tap again to see the help of the week
Make sure the SD card is in the phone and available for record.
Data for import is not found (maybe you did not export data for this program). Also make sure the SD card is in the phone and available for record.
Version of the imported data does not match the version of the application. Update version of the application (from which you export the data), again export the data and repeat the import.
Are you sure you want to delete this record?
You need to update the Samsung Apps to start downloading the app.
"You can buy the full version of the app with all programs: • %s • %s • %s • %s • %s or remove ads for free for several days."
The free trial will expire on %s. To continue using the app, press \"Buy Now\".
The free trial expired on %s. To continue using the app, press \"Buy Now\".
Please login with your Samsung account in the settings of your device in order to continue.
